original_title: Fraggle Rock: a Merry Fraggle Holiday
overview: A Merry Fraggle Holiday is a Fraggle Rock DVD containing three episodes from the series, released on November 3, 2009.  Episodes "The Bells of Fraggle Rock" "The Grapes of Generosity" "The Perfect Blue Rollie"
title: Fraggle Rock: a Merry Fraggle Holiday
